frontmatter.name: Oleg Pavlovich Belousov
frontmatter.vita: Belarusian Soviet director, screenwriter, operator. Honored art worker of the Belarusian SSR (1974).

timelineData.text: Worked as a literary employee of the newspaper «Literature and art».
Founder and artistic director of the Belarusfilm cartoon studio.
Founder and artistic director of animation studios, including the studio «ABC».
Member of the Belarusian Union of Journalists, the Belarusian Union of Cinematographers, the Belarusian Union of Artists and the Belarusian Popular Front «Revival»
Author of «My city» (2005) and  collection of poems «Kazantip notebook» (2006)

work.title: Very old man with huge wings
